title: Where Plants Grow
description: Where Plants Grow is an informational book that explains the different conditions under which plants can grow. The familiar topic, repeated text, and picture-to-text correspondence make this an easy book for early readers.
reviewWords: air, inside, outside, plants, pots, rocks, sand, soil, sunlight, water
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Understand and identify main idea and details
phonics: Short Vowels : Identify short vowels Ii and Oo
grammar: Capitalization and Punctuation                : Capitalize and punctuate sentences
